description.value: The PCORNet Diagnosis,Procedure and Lab Source contains the codes to be used by PCORNet data marts.

definition.value: Use “OD” for diagnoses entered into the EHR that are associated with an Order. Use “OD” for any diagnosis associated with an encounter that is entered into the EHR by a provider.
Billing pertains to internal healthcare processes and data sources.
Claim pertains to data from the bill fulfillment, generally data sources held by insurers and other health plans.
Use “DR” for all diagnoses that are derived or imputed through analytical procedures (e.g., natural language processing).
Source of the diagnosis information is No information.
Source of the diagnosis information is Unknown.
Source of the diagnosis information is Other.
